Put Your Ideas into Practice Build a career, make a discovery, shape the future.

Together Safely

At Albion College, we are committed to a safe and healthy fall semester for our students, faculty, staff and community members. Our COVID-19 response focuses on three main areas: education, environmental adaptation, and population health monitoring and risk reduction.

A Message From
Student Leaders

Boldly Create the Future You Want

You’ll take what you learn in the classroom out into the world. You’ll gain the knowledge, skills and experiences you’ll need to be ready for what’s next.

You Belong at Albion

Albion College is an undergraduate, liberal arts institution committed to academic excellence. We are learning-centered and recognize that valuable learning takes place in and outside the classroom, on and off campus. We prepare students to translate critical thought into action.

Our Mission
